name: Word Chain
description:
Word Chain!

Chain words together by their starting and ending letters and see how many words can you chain without repeating words!

Expand your vocabulary as you learn new words while playing word chain and get better at spelling words!

Play alone or against your friends and challenge your vocabulary! Play it in English, Spanish, and Polish!

TEST YOUR MIGHT!

--------------------------------------

NOTICE!

When playing against the computer, the computer might choose ANY word, meaning that the computer might occasionally choose an offensive or obscene word.  VIEWER/PLAYER DISCRETION IS ADVISED!
